mapper.select: select LANG_ID as langId, SCHEDULE_OPTION_IDENTI_NO as scheduleOptionIdentiNo, COURSE_IDENTI_NO as courseIdentiNo, COURSE_SCHEULE_NAME as courseScheuleName, BGN_DATE as bgnDate, END_DATE as endDate, START_HOUR as startHour, LATEST_START_HOUR as latestStartHour, RETAIL_PRICE as retailPrice, COMMISION as commision, PRICE as price, INFANT_FREE as infantFree, PROMOTION_F_LG as promotionFLg, PROMOTION_BGN_DATE as promotionBgnDate, PROMOTION_END_DATE as promotionEndDate, DISCOUNT_FLG as discountFlg, DISCOUNT_PERCENT as discountPercent, DISCOUNT_VALUE as discountValue, LARGE_DISCOUNT_FLG as largeDiscountFlg, LARGE_DISCOUNT_TYPE as largeDiscountType, LARGE_DISCOUNT_PERCENT as largeDiscountPercent, LARGE_DISCOUNT_VALUE as largeDiscountValue, LARGE_GROUP_LIMIT as largeGroupLimit, WORK_DAY as workDay, DEL_FLG as delFlg, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(MODIFY_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as modifyTime from SCHEDULE_OPTION

select LANG_ID as langId, SCHEDULE_OPTION_IDENTI_NO as scheduleOptionIdentiNo, COURSE_IDENTI_NO as courseIdentiNo, COURSE_SCHEULE_NAME as courseScheuleName, BGN_DATE as bgnDate, END_DATE as endDate, START_HOUR as startHour, LATEST_START_HOUR as latestStartHour, RETAIL_PRICE as retailPrice, COMMISION as commision, PRICE as price, INFANT_FREE as infantFree, PROMOTION_F_LG as promotionFLg, PROMOTION_BGN_DATE as promotionBgnDate, PROMOTION_END_DATE as promotionEndDate, DISCOUNT_FLG as discountFlg, DISCOUNT_PERCENT as discountPercent, DISCOUNT_VALUE as discountValue, LARGE_DISCOUNT_FLG as largeDiscountFlg, LARGE_DISCOUNT_TYPE as largeDiscountType, LARGE_DISCOUNT_PERCENT as largeDiscountPercent, LARGE_DISCOUNT_VALUE as largeDiscountValue, LARGE_GROUP_LIMIT as largeGroupLimit, WORK_DAY as workDay, DEL_FLG as delFlg, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(MODIFY_TIME,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as modifyTime from SCHEDULE_OPTION where LANG_ID =#{langId} and SCHEDULE_OPTION_IDENTI_NO =#{scheduleOptionIdentiNo}
mapper.update: update SCHEDULE_OPTION set LANG_ID= #{langId}, SCHEDULE_OPTION_IDENTI_NO= #{scheduleOptionIdentiNo}, COURSE_IDENTI_NO= #{courseIdentiNo}, COURSE_SCHEULE_NAME= #{courseScheuleName}, BGN_DATE= #{bgnDate}, END_DATE= #{endDate}, START_HOUR= #{startHour}, LATEST_START_HOUR= #{latestStartHour}, RETAIL_PRICE= #{retailPrice}, COMMISION= #{commision}, PRICE= #{price}, INFANT_FREE= #{infantFree}, PROMOTION_F_LG= #{promotionFLg}, PROMOTION_BGN_DATE= #{promotionBgnDate}, PROMOTION_END_DATE= #{promotionEndDate}, DISCOUNT_FLG= #{discountFlg}, DISCOUNT_PERCENT= #{discountPercent}, DISCOUNT_VALUE= #{discountValue}, LARGE_DISCOUNT_FLG= #{largeDiscountFlg}, LARGE_DISCOUNT_TYPE= #{largeDiscountType}, LARGE_DISCOUNT_PERCENT= #{largeDiscountPercent}, LARGE_DISCOUNT_VALUE= #{largeDiscountValue}, LARGE_GROUP_LIMIT= #{largeGroupLimit}, WORK_DAY= #{workDay}, DEL_FLG= #{delFlg}, CREATE_TIME= #{createTime}, MODIFY_TIME= now() where LANG_ID =#{langId} and SCHEDULE_OPTION_IDENTI_NO =#{scheduleOptionIdentiNo}
mapper.insert: insert into SCHEDULE_OPTION( LANG_ID, SCHEDULE_OPTION_IDENTI_NO, COURSE_IDENTI_NO, COURSE_SCHEULE_NAME, BGN_DATE, END_DATE, START_HOUR, LATEST_START_HOUR, RETAIL_PRICE, COMMISION, PRICE, INFANT_FREE, PROMOTION_F_LG, PROMOTION_BGN_DATE, PROMOTION_END_DATE, DISCOUNT_FLG, DISCOUNT_PERCENT, DISCOUNT_VALUE, LARGE_DISCOUNT_FLG, LARGE_DISCOUNT_TYPE, LARGE_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, LARGE_DISCOUNT_VALUE, LARGE_GROUP_LIMIT, WORK_DAY, DEL_FLG, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME )values( #{langId}, #{scheduleOptionIdentiNo}, #{courseIdentiNo}, #{courseScheuleName}, #{bgnDate}, #{endDate}, #{startHour}, #{latestStartHour}, #{retailPrice}, #{commision}, #{price}, #{infantFree}, #{promotionFLg}, #{promotionBgnDate}, #{promotionEndDate}, #{discountFlg}, #{discountPercent}, #{discountValue}, #{largeDiscountFlg}, #{largeDiscountType}, #{largeDiscountPercent}, #{largeDiscountValue}, #{largeGroupLimit}, #{workDay}, #{delFlg}, now() , now() )
